import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import AddSynonym from './AddSynonym' function AddEntityTable({ entity, el, removSynonym, handelSubmitSynonym }) { const [inputState, setInputState] = useState(true) return (
{el.synonyms.map((child, i) => (child && {child} ) )} ) } export default AddEntityTable
